body_html: The atomicAdd errors at least might be due to a missing -latomic flag in the linkopts of the relevant binary. Maybe something got added to the cmake build and left out of bazel? (but I'm not sure how fully Bazel builds on Windows are supported)
body_text: The atomicAdd errors at least might be due to a missing -latomic flag in the linkopts of the relevant binary. Maybe something got added to the cmake build and left out of bazel? (but I'm not sure how fully Bazel builds on Windows are supported)
body: The atomicAdd errors at least might be due to a missing -latomic flag in the linkopts of the relevant binary. Maybe something got added to the cmake build and left out of bazel? (but I'm not sure how fully Bazel builds on Windows are supported)
